mapper.select: SELECT IA.id , IA.status , IA.type , IA.content , IA.file_id , F.file_url , IA.admin_comment , IA.receive_email_yn , IA.requested_at , IA.processed_at , IA.user_id , U.nickname AS userNickname FROM GACHA_INFO_ADD IA LEFT JOIN IMAGE_FILE F ON F.file_id = IA.file_id LEFT JOIN USER U ON U.id = IA.user_id
